They must remove all of the current recruitment team who produce advertisements for the army and replace with veterans and patriots. Fix this

rejection.details:
We can't publish petitions that calls for anyone to be appointed, or to lose their job.

We also cannot publish anonymous petitions.

We could accept a petition calling for a specific recruitment campaign, as long as it is clear what it is asking for and meets the other standards for petitions.
